Package toy.servers

Interface Server

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CTServer, ToyServer
    public interface Server
    This interface define the method a Toy based server supports. To simplify work with different designs (e.g a Top server) every Toy based server should implement this interface.
    Author:
    Yehontan Buchnik

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Types.txID addTransaction​(Types.Transaction tx)
      Add a transaction to the transaction pool.
      int getBCSize()
      Get the current Blockchain size.
      int getID()
      Get the ID of the server.
      int isTxPresent​(java.lang.String txID)
      Check the state of the transaction with the given txID.
      Types.Block nonBlockingDeliver​(int index)
      Deliver the i_th block of the Blockchain.
      void serve()
      Start the server.
      void shutdown()
      Shutting down the server.
      void start()
      Initiates the underlying protocols of a Toy based server (i.e bft-SMaRt).

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Initiates the underlying protocols of a Toy based server (i.e bft-SMaRt).

      • serve

        void serve()
        Start the server. After calling this method the server should be able to serve clients requests. The reason for why start ane serve are separated is dut to the fact that TOY great power is when the system is fault-less and synchronized. By this separation we can wait for the system to get synchronized before starting to server clients requests.

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Shutting down the server. After invoking this method the server is unable to server more requests as well as to participate the algorithm.

      • addTransaction

        Types.txID addTransaction​(Types.Transaction tx)
        Add a transaction to the transaction pool.
        Parameters:
        tx - the transaction to be added
        Returns:
        An object that identifies the transaction by unique GUID

      • isTxPresent

        int isTxPresent​(java.lang.String txID)
        Check the state of the transaction with the given txID.
        Parameters:
        txID - the ID of the transaction to be checked
        Returns:
        An integer that indicates the state of the transaction

      • getID

        int getID()
        Get the ID of the server.
        Returns:
        ID of the server

      • getBCSize

        int getBCSize()
        Get the current Blockchain size.
        Returns:
        the current Blockchain size

      • nonBlockingDeliver

        Types.Block nonBlockingDeliver​(int index)
        Deliver the i_th block of the Blockchain. Note that this method does not block the caller.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the block to be delivered
        Returns:
        The desired block if exists or null if it does not
